text: Sniper is a 1993 American Peruvian Panamanian action movie directed by Luis Llosa and starring Tom Berenger, Billy Zane, Aden Young, J. T. Walsh, Gary Swanson, Hank Garrett, Rex Linn. This is the first movie the Sniper in film series and was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1993 action movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:Panamanian movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Llosa
title: Sniper (1993 movie)
